sourcesContent:
import React,{useState} from 'react' import {Link,useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' import H01 from '../../../assets/images/header-inner/H01.jpg' const InnerHeader = () => { const location = useLocation(); const bgImage = H01; const [count, setCount] = useState(0); if(location.pathname == "/careers") { const bgImage = H01; setBgDetails(`

About W2P IT

Our Expertise. Know more about what we do

`); } return ( <>
{bgDetails}
  • About us
  • Careers
  • How we work
  • Our team
  • Mission and vision
  • Our values
) } export default InnerHeader
